addiu $3 $0 0xb2dd
001001 00000 00011 1011 0010 1101 1101
0x2403b2dd

sb $3 22($0)
101000 00000 00011 0000 0000 0001 0110
0xa0030016

jr $0
000000 00000 00000 00000 00000 001000
0x00000008

lw $2 20($0)
100011 00000 00010 0000 0000 0001 0100
0x8c020014

assert v0 = 0x0011dd33

mem[20] = 0x00
mem[21] = 0x11
mem[22] = 0x22 => dd
mem[23] = 0x33
mem[24] = 0x44
mem[25] = 0x55
mem[26] = 0x66
mem[27] = 0x77
